column1: * Melkor appears in Formenos and speaks with Fëanor
column2: but Fëanor sends him away realising that Melkor covets the Silmarils.

column1: * Finwë sends messengers to Manwë warning him of what happened at Formenos.
* Oromë and Tulkas set out in pursuit of Melkor
column2: but he had already passed through the Calacirya and left Valinor.

column1: * Melkor meets with Ungoliant in Avathar and they begin their plan of the destruction of the Two Trees.
